name: checkfree
description: Check if rooms are free during any period.

options.name: rooms
options.description: The room codes to query, separated by space and case-insensitive.

options.name: hour
options.description: The hour to query, in 24-hour time. Defaults to now.

name: labfree
description: Check if the labs in the McNulty building are free during any period.

options.name: hour
options.description: The hour to query, in 24-hour time. Defaults to now.

name: timetable
description: Find a timetable for a course and day

options.name: course
options.description: The code for the course you want to query. Case insensitive.

options.name: day
options.description: The day of this week to check for. Defaults to today.

name: ping
description: Check if the bot is currently alive.
